name: Digitus
description:
Welcome to the intergalactic arcade extravaganza, Digitus!  Fight alien space ships playing as a disembodied hand controlled with your mouse.  Poke and punch your enemies into submission.  Immerse yourself in a neon-lit 80's experience as you try your best to complete 3 levels, each more difficult and skill-based than the last.

System Design - Simon Ganley

Art and Sound - Colin Page

Level Design - Harrison Lister
